99-1552. State ex rel. Ohio Patrolmen's Benevolent Assn. v.Mentor.
In Mandamus. This cause is before the court for its consideration under S.Ct.Prac.R. X(5). Upon consideration,
IT IS ORDERED that relators' claims regarding payroll, overtime, and having investigative records be DISMISSED as moot.
IT IS FURTHER ORDERED that regarding relators' remaining claims concerning the Spetrino investigative records and their entitlement to attorney fees, an alternative writ is GRANTED, the parties shall file evidence regarding these claims within twenty days of this entry, relators shall file a merit brief within twenty days after the submission of evidence, respondents shall file their merit brief within twenty days after relators' merit brief is filed, and relators may file a reply brief within five days after respondents' merit brief is filed.Page 1426
